item.title: Custom Domains on Github Pages Are Hard (i)
item.description: I’ve been using my Hugo setup for just over a month now (and really enjoying it!), but I’ve made a few changes to this blog that I think are going to make things even better: I have a custom domain now I’m using Netlify for hosting, instead of Github Pages I’m taking advantage of Netlify’s Deploy Previews All of these changes came with some level of consideration, so I want to take some time to walk through my thought process here.
